text.p: If the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] form an orthonormal basis of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline], and [mathjaxinline]\{ w_1; w_2;\ldots w_ k\}[/mathjaxinline] is an orthonormal list of vectors in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline], then [mathjaxinline]\{ Aw_1; Aw_2;\ldots Aw_ k\}[/mathjaxinline] is also an orthonormal list of vectors.

font.p: From the video, we can conclude that [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] preserves norms. Therefore, since [mathjaxinline]\| w_ i\| = 1[/mathjaxinline] for all [mathjaxinline]i[/mathjaxinline], we also have [mathjaxinline]\| Aw_ i\| = 1[/mathjaxinline] for all [mathjaxinline]i[/mathjaxinline]. Hence the list is orthonormal, not just orthogonal.
